text: A tea cocktail is a cocktail that uses tea as an ingredient. ==Examples== ===Hard teas made by breweries=== Hard teas sold by brewers have included Twisted Tea and Best Damn Sweet Tea. ===Duos=== *Gin and tea ===Trios=== *John Daly (cocktail) (vodka, lemonade, and iced tea) *Hard citrus iced tea (vodka, honey, black tea) ===Other=== *Canelazo (aguardiente, sugar, cinnamon, lemon juice, fruit pulp) *Sweet tea and bourbon (bourbon, black tea, peach tea, simple syrup) ==References== Category:Cocktails with tea
title: Tea cocktail
